perturbation.original_text: 1.7 Governing Law This Agreement is governed by, and will be construed in accordance with, the laws of British Columbia, Canada.
perturbation.changed_text:
10.3 Binding Effect This Agreement is binding upon and enures to the benefit of the parties and their respective successors and assigns, and no party shall have the right to assign its rights hereunder or any interest herein without the prior written consent of the other parties.
1.7 Governing Law This Agreement is governed by, and will be construed in accordance with, the laws of British Columbia, Canada.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the governing law clause from its own dedicated section to be after a clause about successors and assigns makes it less prominent. This could make it harder to enforce, as it's buried within other contractual terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law requiring clear and conspicuous governing law provisions.

perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law requiring clear and conspicuous indemnification provisions.
